details: FILL, CAP, APPLY TOP AND BOTTOM LABEL, AND PACK EACH JAR INTO AN INDIVIDUAL CARTON. PACK 6 CARTONED JARS INSIDE A BOOK FOLD SHIPPER. CLOSE AND TAPE SHIPPER. AFFIX ONE CASE LABEL TO A CONSISTENT LENGTH PANEL OF SHIPPER. PALLETIZE PER APPROVED PALLET PATTERN. PLACE ONE LAYER PAD UNDER 1st LAYER.
BOTTOM LABELS TO BE APPROXIMATELY CENTERED INSIDE RECESSED AREA OF JAR. LID LABELS TO BE APPROXIMATELY CENETERED ON LID. NO ROTATIONAL ORIENTATION OF TOP/BOTTOM LABEL IS REQUIRED.
PALLET TO BE STRETCH WRAPPED PRIOR TO SHIPMENT.
